A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really don't get why people have so much to complain about. Yeah\, there were some moments that were a bit much for me\, like the 'infamous' Leia Superman scene\, but all in all\, I enjoyed the film thoroughly. The film didn't take itself too seriously\, all the duels were entertaining and exhilarating\, and most of all\, it tried new things. Some of those new things worked while others didn't\, which is normal\, and considering how conservative and audience-conscious recent Star Wars films have been\, Last Jedi is a welcome change. I can't wait to see how they kill the past and build something new from here.
